titleStmt.title: Delay of reformation provoking Gods further indignation represented in a sermon preached at Westminster to the honourable House of Commons assembled in Parliament at their late solemn monethly fast, April 29, 1646 / by James Nalton.
titleStmt.author: Nalton, James, 1600-1662.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
